title: Шеф
overview: Kai is a talented and ambitious chef in a trendy Moscow restaurant. He hopes to receive the title of the best chef in Russia and maintains a high level of service and service. One day, Kai comes into conflict with a boorish visitor, who turns out to be a high-ranking official, and loses his job. Desperate, Kai gets a job as a cook in a women's colony in the hope that eventually he will be able to open his own restaurant and win the country's main culinary competition.
